title: XPLUSDT and WLFIUSDT Listed on BloFin Perpetual Pre-Market: 0 Maker Fees & 50% off Taker Fees!
content:
Dear BloFin Users,
To expand the list of trading choices offered on BloFin Futures and to enhance users’ trading experience, we have launched the XPLUSDT and WLFIUSDT perpetual contracts in BloFin pre-market trading.
The updates will cover both the web and app interfaces. The details are as follows:
XPLUSDT and WLFIUSDT Perpetual Contracts:
Feature
Details
Listing Time
09:30 UTC on Aug 23,2025
Underlying Asset
XPL (Plasma)
WLFI (Official World Liberty Financial)
Settlement Asset
USDT
USDT
Contract Size
1 XPL
1 WLFI
Price Quotation
1 XPL value calculated in USDT equivalent
1 WLFI value calculated in USDT equivalent
Tick Size
0.0001
0.0001
Leverage
1-50X
1-25X
Funding Fee Settlement Frequency
Every 4 hours
Every 4 hours
Trading Hours
24/7
24/7
🎉Trade and Enjoy 0 Maker Fees & 50% off Taker Fees!
To celebrate the listing of the aforementioned perpetual contracts on BloFin Futures, BloFin offers 0 Maker fees and 50% off Taker fees for the first 48 hours for users when trading these contract pairs, with the maximum Taker fee being only 0.03%!
Note: Pre-market trading involves high risk. Due to limited liquidity and market volatility, significant price fluctuations may occur. Please conduct your own research, assess the risks carefully, and proceed with caution. BloFin does not provide investment advice and is not responsible for any potential losses.
To experience the innovative power of BloFin, please go to the BloFin website or download the App from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store to trade easily on the go.
Thanks for your support!
BloFin Team
Aug 23, 2025
Find us on:
X (Twitter)
Instagram
Telegram
Discord
Youtube
BloFin reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice.
Risk Warning: Digital assets are highly speculative and subject to significant volatility. They may become illiquid at any time, and investors could lose the entire value of their investment. Before trading any digital asset, you should conduct your own research and assess your risk tolerance. BloFin is not liable for any losses you may incur from trading digital assets. This material should not be construed as financial advice. For more information, view our Terms of Use and Risk Warning.
